Class SearchAct

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.android.dev.foodie.SearchAct

  • public class SearchAct
extends Activity
    Gets User input search information from the UI and pass it to another class

      • populate_spinner

        private java.util.List<java.lang.String> populate_spinner(java.lang.String URL,
                                                java.util.List<java.lang.String> list,
                                                java.lang.String key)
        Advanced Search - to return list of objects from database to populate spinner
        Parameters:
        URL - URL to pass in to parse XML from httpresponse
        list - list extracted from XML to populate spinner with
        key - which attribute we want to extract from the XML (i.e. to return a list of faculties in NUS we call for a "location" key)
        Returns:
        list
